headline: NGPL PipeCo LLC Announces Successful Receipt of Requisite Consents Related to Consent Solicitations with Respect to its 4.875% Senior Notes due 2027 and 3.250% Senior Notes due 2031
summary: NGPL PipeCo LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the "Company"), announced today that the requisite consents have been received from the holders ("Holders") of the Company's outstanding (i) 4.875% Senior Notes due 2027 (the "2027 Notes") and (ii) 3.250% Senior Notes due 2031 (the "2031 Notes" and, together with the 2027 Notes, the "Notes" and each a "Series of Notes") to certain amendments (the "Proposed Amendments") to the terms of (i) the Indenture, dated as of August 1, 2017, relating t

headline: 3 Energy Biggies Offering Strong Dividends Amid Volatility
summary: Investors looking for stable, income-generating assets for their portfolios may focus on large-cap energy stocks like WMB, CVX and KMI.

headline: Eni Eyes More Upstream Asset Sales After $1.65B Vitol Deal
summary: E is exploring further upstream asset sales after offloading stakes in Ivory Coast and Congo to Vitol in a $1.65 billion deal.

headline: Dividends Over Drama: Here's What Smart Money Is Buying
summary: In volatile markets, a smart strategy is to buy the dip, especially for those holding cash reserves. Read more to see my recommendations.
